name: scape (chelomm)
description:
Controls:

Blue character: 

WA(S)D to move.

Hold Spacebar to pick up crates.

Pink character:

Arrow Keys to move. (Can double jump)

2 Friendly monsters end up inside a cave. Help them to get out of there. You need to use both characters special abilities (blue can pick up crates, pink one can double jump) to successfully help them. There are only 4 levels, and the first 2 are just an introduction to the game. But there's a chance that more levels will come up in the future.

This is my second game for a jam. Hope you guys enjoy it.
